data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Niclas Eliasson for Nimes gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 1, PSG have a goal kick.
Nimes's Gaetan Paquiez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nimes.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as PSG is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Nimes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in PSG's half?
In the minute 4, PSG's Kylian Mbappe gets in a shot on goal at Stade des Costieres. But the effort is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Clement Turpin awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 6, Lucas Deaux (Nimes) gets a yellow card.
PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
Moise Kean of PSG gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 9, Clement Turpin awards Nimes a goal kick.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to PSG.
Goal kick for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
In the minute 11, Leandro Paredes is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Ander Herrera (PSG) has replaced the possibly injured Leandro Paredes at Stade des Costieres.
In the minute 12, Clement Turpin signals a Nimes throw-in in PSG's half.
Free kick PSG.
Loick Landre (Nimes) has been shown a straight red card by referee Clement Turpin.
Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Throw-in PSG.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
Rafinha (PSG) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Clement Turpin.
Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 20, Idrissa Gueye (PSG) has received a yellow card from Clement Turpin.
Pablo Sarabia (PSG) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 22, Clement Turpin awards Nimes a goal kick.
PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 24, In Nimes, Nimes push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
PSG's Kylian Mbappe attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 24, Goal kick for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nimes.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Clement Turpin signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
PSG's Ander Herrera goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Corner awarded to PSG.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
Nimes to take a throw-in in PSG territory.
Nimes have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 32, PSG take a 0-1 lead thanks to Kylian Mbappe.
Great play from Rafinha to set up the goal.
PSG's Moise Kean breaks free at Stade des Costieres. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 34, Nimes have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nimes.
Free kick for Nimes in the half of PSG.
In the minute 36, Nimes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as PSG is awarded a throw-in in their half.
PSG pushes forward through Alessandro Florenzi, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 38, PSG have been awarded a corner by Clement Turpin.
In Nimes Nimes drive forward through Niclas Eliasson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for PSG in the half of Nimes.
In the minute 40, PSG's Moise Kean is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to PSG.
In Nimes, Idrissa Gueye (PSG) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Clement Turpin awards the home team a throw-in.
Patrick Burner is back on his feet again.
In the minute 42, Nimes to take a throw-in in PSG territory.
In the minute 42, Patrick Burner is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in PSG's half?
Renaud Ripart gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nimes.
In the minute 44, Kylian Mbappe (PSG) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Nimes defenders.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
PSG awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for PSG at Stade des Costieres.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Clement Turpin signals a throw-in for PSG, close to Nimes's area.
Florian Miguel for Nimes is back on the field again.
The first-half is over at Stade des Costieres.
In the minute 45, The match at Stade des Costieres has been interrupted briefly for a check on Florian Miguel, who is down injured.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Stade des Costieres.
Clement Turpin awards Nimes a goal kick.
Throw-in PSG.
In the minute 49, PSG drives forward and Kylian Mbappe gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Nimes needs to be cautious. PSG have an attacking throw-in.
PSG's Kylian Mbappe misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 50, Goal kick for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for PSG in the half of Nimes.
The home team have replaced Andres Cubas with Pablo Martinez. This is the first substitution made today by Jerome Arpinon.
Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 56, Clement Turpin signals a Nimes throw-in in PSG's half.
Nimes have a goal kick.
Free kick PSG.
In the minute 58, Colin Dagba is replacing Rafinha for PSG at Stade des Costieres.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Clement Turpin.
In the minute 61, Ander Herrera's header is off-target for PSG.
Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
Clement Turpin awards Nimes a goal kick.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Nimes in the half of PSG.
Throw-in high up the field for PSG in Nimes.
PSG are pushing forward but Idrissa Gueye's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 65, It's a goal kick for the home team in Nimes.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
PSG are on the attack at Stade des Costieres, where Alessandro Florenzi is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
In the minute 67, PSG's Pablo Sarabia gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Nimes defender.
Nimes make their second substitution with Karim Aribi replacing Nolan Roux.
Corner awarded to PSG.
In the minute 70, Can PSG capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nimes's half?
PSG have been awarded a corner by Clement Turpin.
Throw-in Nimes.
In the minute 71, Nimes are coming forward and Niclas Eliasson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
PSG have a goal kick.
In Nimes, Kylian Mbappe of PSG is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to PSG.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
Clement Turpin signals a Nimes throw-in in PSG's half.
In the minute 74, Nimes to take a throw-in in PSG territory.
Free kick for PSG in their own half.
Goal kick for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
In the minute 76, Agony for PSG as Alessandro Florenzi 's header comes back off the post and is cleared.
Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
Can PSG get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
Goal! Alessandro Florenzi extends PSG lead to 0-2 with a header.
In the minute 77, That's a fine assist from Pablo Sarabia.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to Nimes.
Free kick for PSG in the half of Nimes.
Goal! Kylian Mbappe extends PSG's lead to 0-3.
In the minute 83, Pablo Sarabia with an assist there.
The home team have replaced Lamine Fomba with Matteo Ahlinvi. This is the fifth substitution made today by Jerome Arpinon.
Thomas Tuchel is making the team's third substitution at Stade des Costieres with Jese replacing Kylian Mbappe.
In the minute 84, Thomas Tuchel (PSG) is making a fourth substitution, with Kays Ruiz Atil replacing Alessandro Florenzi.
Moussa Kone is replacing Renaud Ripart for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
Marco Ludivin Majouga is replacing Niclas Eliasson for the home team.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
Clement Turpin awards the home team a throw-in.
Clement Turpin signals a Nimes throw-in in PSG's half.
In the minute 87, PSG have been awarded a corner by Clement Turpin.
Moise Kean (PSG) gets in a strike â€“ but the header hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to PSG.
In the minute 88, Pablo Sarabia puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-4.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Nimes. The final score is 0-4.
